description: This file defines a React functional component 'Header' that renders the top navigation bar for a web application. It includes role-based links, logo display, login/register links, and a sign-out button. It leverages Next.js components such as 'Link' and 'Image', and custom hooks for authentication.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the top header with role-based navigation links and user actions.
